arguments.title: EPA Draft GHG Reporting Update – Action Required by Jan 2026
arguments.body:
## Summary
The EPA has proposed a draft revision to the Greenhouse Gas Reporting Program:
- **New reporting threshold:** Facilities emitting >10,000 mt CO₂e annually must report each year starting 1 Jan 2026.
- **New reporting format:** Mandatory XML schema (see Appendix A).

## Impact on Our Controls
- **SC‑01 (Annual GHG Reporting):** Matches the new requirement but needs threshold logic update.
- **SC‑02 (XML Reporting Template):** Matches format requirement; update template to new schema.

## Recommended Actions
1. Update the emission‑threshold calculation in the GHG reporting system (target completion: 30 Nov 2025).
2. Revise the XML template according to Appendix A (target completion: 15 Dec 2025).
3. Schedule a brief cross‑functional review meeting (invite: Sustainability Lead, IT, Compliance).

Please acknowledge receipt and confirm the timelines.
